creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue-green with red; 1/2"-1" woven bands separated by 3/8" wide black and white woven strips; 3"-3-1/2" warp fringe at both ends; fringe knotted at very end
title: Head Scarf
